text: Also we have created 50 modules on marketplace so after installing any theme you can use these module by installing into your website, you can check. <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/modules?eco_providers=StraightGrowth|https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/modules?eco_providers=StraightGrowth>

Hey hey! Good question. I 100% think you should get familiar with it as it’s a game changer for sure - main benefits include a significant increase in code reusability, improved load times for complicated interactive UI components (server side loading mixed with stateful components), ability to use node libraries, etc! 

I would give <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/build-modules-and-partials-with-react|this doc> a read through — it outlines a lot of the perks as well as some of the (current) limitations
